text: 4.16: FG 20.28; Ro 11.14; 1 Ko 9.22; Ze 5.20Ndu wo mbui tɨvi, ndu tuituigip nta ganɨv, mba gumgi gu mbigi khɨvav, mbe nzuai ŋaari, ndu vhɨra tuituigip nta ganɨri. Ndu khaŋ tɨgɨp havhargip maaŋ muunga, ndu mba ŋgari ŋaarar panan, Fhe Bakɨme taagip ndu ndiv, ndu buni mbararagi gumgi gu mbigi, ana vhɨra taagip mbe ndigirga.
